channel.title: Help with editing shops and one more thing
channel.description:
1.okay I know that you go to shops and edit there, but how do you chenge the price on it?
2.Andd how do you make a new shop [b]or[/b] make a npc trade stuff when you talk to it
3.And how do you change the npc that sell stuff, like bobs axes how do i change bob to hans and how to change bank names like "bank of ----"
Thank you!!! :)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 12:03:25 AM[/size][hr]Someone plz help

item.title: Help with editing shops and one more thing
item.dc:creator: @D_a_n1 D__a__n
item.description:
@D_a_n1 wrote:

  1. go to the items file and change the first 3 numbers to the price
    2.to make a new shop just add one into the client and shops info, add items to it etc.
    3.just edit in ID’s in the shops file and at the top it will say “bobs axes!” or whatever - just change that to change the title

Read full topic
